mapper.sql: QSTN_ID, QSTN_TITLE, QSTN_KEY, QSTN_DESC, STATUS, CREATED, LASTMOD, CREATER, MODIFYER
mapper.insert: insert into gen_question (QSTN_ID,QSTN_TITLE, QSTN_KEY, QSTN_DESC, STATUS, CREATED, LASTMOD, CREATER, MODIFYER) values (#{qstnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qstnTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qstnKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qstnDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastmod,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyer,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update gen_question
QSTN_TITLE = #{qstnTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QSTN_KEY = #{qstnKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QSTN_DESC = #{qstnDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATED = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LASTMOD = #{lastmod,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFYER = #{modifyer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where QSTN_ID = #{qstnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update gen_question set QSTN_TITLE = #{qstnTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QSTN_KEY = #{qstnKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QSTN_DESC = #{qstnDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATED = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LASTMOD = #{lastmod,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFYER = #{modifyer,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where QSTN_ID = #{qstnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM gen_question WHERE STATUS='E' AND CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY CREATED

SELECT
FROM gen_question WHERE STATUS='E' AND CREATED >= #{start,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND CREATED <= #{end,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY CREATED

SELECT
FROM gen_question WHERE STATUS='E' AND QSTN_KEY like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{qstnKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%') ORDER BY CREATED

SELECT
FROM gen_question WHERE STATUS='E' AND ( QSTN_KEY like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{word,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%') OR QSTN_TITLE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{word,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%') OR QSTN_DESC like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{word,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%') ) ORDER BY CREATED
